Bank_Fee_Service_ContractObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Bank_Fee_Service_ContractObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Bank_Fee_Service_ContractObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: Base Fee should only be 0 if Flat pricing type selected.
Minimum Fee should only be 0 if Flat pricing type selected.
Enter a Maximum Fee that is greater than the Minimum Fee.
Maximum Fee should only be 0 if Flat pricing type selected.
The fixed price cannot be 0 if fixed pricing type selected.
If the pricing type is not fixed, fixed price should be 0.
The flat price cannot be 0 if flat pricing type selected.
If the pricing type is not flat, flat price should be 0.

Bank_Fee_Service_Contract_Pricing_Tier_D.description: The minimum amount for the current tier.

validation.validation: The pricing type is tiered, therefore the tiered minimum is required.

Bank_Fee_Service_Contract_Pricing_Tier_D.description: The maximum amount for the current tier.

validation.validation: The pricing type is tiered, therefore the tiered maximum is required.
Enter a Maximum Quantity that is greater than or equal to the Minimum Quantity.

Bank_Fee_Service_Contract_Pricing_Tier_D.description: The price for the current tier.

validation.validation: The pricing type is tiered, therefore the tiered price is required.

Bank_Fee_Service_Contract_Line_Data.description: The element container for tier pricing.

validation.validation: The Tier Minimum level must be 1 more than the previous Tier Maximum level.
Enter a Pricing Tier range that doesn’t overlap with the previous Pricing Tier range.
The Pricing Tier level selected exceeds the amount of Pricing Tiers.
You cannot use a Tier Level for more than 1 Pricing Tier.

validation.validation: Threshold Pricing Reference cannot be processed as the Threshold Pricing does not belong to the Service Contract
The pricing type is threshold, therefore the threshold min is required.
The pricing type is threshold, therefore the threshold price is required.

Bank_Fee_Service_Contract_Line_Data.description: The element container for the threshold pricing.

validation.validation: Enter a Pricing Threshold that isn’t already in use.

Bank_Fee_Service_Contract_Data.description: The element container of the bank fee service contract line data.

validation.validation: If the pricing type is not threshold, threshold pricing should be empty.
If the pricing type is not tiered, tiered pricing should be empty.
Select 1 Pricing Type for the Bank Fee Service Code: [code].
Service Codes with the Threshold pricing type must have at least 1 Pricing Threshold.
Service Codes with the Tiered pricing type must have at least 1 Pricing Tier.
Select 1 Pricing Currency for the Bank Fee Service Code: [code] already uses [currency].
